Package com.spec.web.expresso.message

Interface Request

All Known Implementing Classes:
HttpRequest
public interface Request
Represent a Http request

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    body()
    Returns the body(payload) of the Http request

    Get the url parameter value against the given name.

  • Method Details

    • json

      <T> T json(Class<T> type) throws IllegalArgumentException, IOException
      Gives the payload as json
      Type Parameters:
      T - The json response type
      Parameters:
      type - The class type to deserialize to
      Returns:
      The deserialized object
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If payload is invalid
      IOException - If there is error reading the request body

    • body

      String body() throws IOException
      Returns the body(payload) of the Http request
      Returns:
      The body of the request
      Throws:
      IOException - May throw and IOException if it cannot read the body of response.

    • getParams

      String getParams(String name)
      Get the url parameter value against the given name.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the parameter , this name should be same as the name of the parameter mentioned in the url pattern
      Returns:
      value of the parameter

    • getQuery

      String getQuery(String name)
      Return the query parameter value against the name
      Parameters:
      name - name of the query parameter
      Returns:
      value of the query parameter
